price: ហើយប្រសិនបើពួកគេបានបពា្ឈប់សង្គ្រាម(បែរមក រកជំនឿ) ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ អល់ឡោះមហាអភ័យទោស មហា អាណិតស្រឡាញ់។
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
